base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Includes a main body, a drawer on top, and a door below. The drawer and door have simple, clean lines and are aligned vertically. The cabinet is rectangular and stands upright.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides horizontally within the top section of the cabinet, supported by internal tracks. The door swings open on hinges attached to one side, allowing access to the interior storage space. Both parts are designed to operate smoothly without interfering with each other’s function.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or integrated into a kitchen or bathroom setup. The drawer and door handles allow easy access for users, facilitating storage of items. The cabinet's design complements modern interiors, interacting visually with surrounding decor.
